question: Which among the following correctly described the plot of the Indian Play Mudra Rakshasha?
option2: Romantic Love story of a demon and a princess
option3: Story of a young Arya Man and a Court Dancer
option4: Intrigues at the time of accession of Chandragupta Maurya
answer: Intrigues at the time of accession of Chandragupta Maurya
explanation: The Mudrarakshasa is a Sanskrit-language play by Vishakhadatta that narrates the ascent of the king Chandragupta Maurya to power in India.
